column4: Can anyone tell me how to install "libwxgtk2.4-python" under ubuntu ?

it says somthing like it issnt a innstalation candiate
works fine on this end, try sudo apt-get update before trying to install

try enabling universe in your config

edit /etc/apt/sources.list and un comment the commented stuff, or do it in synaptic (not sure how as i dont use it)
